mapper.select:
SELECT N_SEQ , N_TITLE , N_REGDATE , N_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY N_SEQ DESC) AS RN , N_SEQ , N_TITLE , N_REGDATE , N_COUNT FROM NOTICE )
WHERE CEIL(RN/5) = #{pnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (N_SEQ , M_SEQ , N_TITLE , N_CONTS , N_REGDATE , N_COUNT) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{m_seq},#{n_title},#{n_conts},SYSDATE,0)
mapper.select: SELECT N_SEQ , M_SEQ , N_TITLE , N_CONTS , N_REGDATE , N_COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE N_SEQ=#{n_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET N_COUNT=N_COUNT+1 WHERE N_SEQ=#{n_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT q.Q_SEQ , m.M_NAME , m.M_EMAIL , q.M_SEQ , q.Q_TITLE , q.Q_REGDATE , q.Q_FLAG FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Q_SEQ DESC) AS RM , Q_SEQ , M_SEQ , Q_TITLE , Q_REGDATE , Q_FLAG FROM QA ) q, MEMBERS m WHERE CEIL(RM/5) = #{pnum} AND q.M_SEQ=m.m_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA ( Q_SEQ , M_SEQ , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTS , Q_REGDATE , Q_FLAG , Q_ANS) VALUES (QA_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{m_seq},#{q_title},#{q_conts},SYSDATE,0,NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT q.q_seq , m.m_name , m.m_email , q.q_title , q.q_regdate , q.q_conts , q.q_ans , q.q_flag FROM QA q, MEMBERS m WHERE Q_SEQ=#{q_seq} AND q.m_seq=m.m_seq
mapper.update: UPDATE QA SET Q_ANS=#{q_ans}, Q_FLAG='1' WHERE Q_SEQ=#{q_seq}
